intro: Polycycnis ornata, commonly known as the ornate polycycnus, is a flowering plant native to certain regions of South America. It belongs to the family Polygonaceae, which includes plants commonly known as buckwheats. The plant is characterized by its upright growth habit and clusters of small, greenish-white flowers. Its leaves are typically ovate with a slightly pubescent surface. Polycycnis ornata is often found in moist, shaded environments such as forest floors or along stream banks.
